ctu_text: The scheme also provides financial assistance to children in need of care and protection. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "The scheme is targeted towards vulnerable children in the age group of 0-18 years, especially those from socially and economically disadvantaged backgrounds. The Bal Sakha Yojana aims to ensure the overall development and well-being of children by providing them with necessary support and protection.
